Scene:
The Feast at Nijo Castle
(Nijōjō haizen / 二条城配膳)

Play: The Tycoon's Exploit (絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

Production: April 1974 National Theatre

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Aioidayū IV (see also Takemoto Aikodayū I) (竹本相生大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II (see also Tsuruzawa Tokutarō) (鶴沢道八 (二))
